label: A10B_cF44_225_cf_a-001
title: LaH$_{10}$ High-T$_{c}$ Superconductor Structure
comments:
This structure was predicted by (Liu, 2017) as a possible near-room-temperature superconductor at pressures above 200 GPa.  Its existence was confirmed by (Geballe, 2018). 
 The lattice constant $a = 4.78${\AA} is taken from (Liu, 2017) prediction at 300 GPa. (Geballe, 2018) found $a = 5.09${\AA} at 172 GPa. 
 (Liu, 2017) give a list of hydrogen positions which are not compatible with space group $Fm\overline{3}m$ \#225.  The positions we assigned are consistent with the work of (Geballe, 2018).
